Trample, haste
[i]Valiant[/i] – Whenever Hinotori-Blessed Tracker becomes the target of a spell or ability you control for the first time each turn, exile the top card of your library. You may put a +1/+1 counter on Hinotori-Blessed Tracker. If you don't, you may play the exiled card until end of turn.
